Constructs a new distribution object.
@2@ Uses {{c|mean}} and {{c|stddev}} as the distribution parameters.
@3@ Uses {{c|params}} as the distribution parameters.

The behavior is undefined if {{c|stddev}} is not greater than zero.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|mean|the ''μ'' distribution parameter (mean)}}
{{par|stddev|the ''σ'' distribution parameter (standard deviation)}}
{{par|params|the distribution parameter set}}
{{par end}}
